main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 8-6-57 in Hollywood & Van Nuys, California at 1900 hrs. The object was described as bright pink, losing altitude, and eventually disappearing. The consensus was that it could possibly be a drone or small aircraft.
interesting points: The UFO was described as having a stubby delta wing, smaller than a jet, and bright pink in color.
The observation was made using ground-radar and lasted approximately 3 minutes.
The sighting was reported by the Senior Director 1st LT House, who suggested that it could be a drone aircraft.
The object was seen over a mountain range, slowing its speed and losing altitude before disappearing.
The report suggests that the UFO might have been a possible drone or small aircraft, indicating a prosaic explanation for the sighting.
